DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine scale structure , reliability , validity tumor-specific questionnaire , QLQ-STO22 , assess quality life patient gastric cancer . - Determine questionnaire 's sensitivity change clinical health status patient . OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord type treatment ( potentially curative v potentially palliative ) , disease stage ( local locoregional v metastatic ) , Karnofsky performance status ( le 80 % vs 80 % ) , initial weight gain ( none v le 10 % total body weight vs 10 % total body weight ) . - Curatively Treated Group : Quality life assess 4 week prior surgery 3 month surgery patient receive total partial gastrectomy curative intent ; 4 week prior chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy , 4 week prior surgery , 3 month surgery patient receive neoadjuvant chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy follow total partial gastrectomy curative intent ; 4 week prior chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy 6 week completion therapy patient receive adjuvant chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy follow total partial gastrectomy ; 4 week prior therapy 3 month completion therapy patient receive endoscopic mucosal resection laparoscopic wedge resection . - Palliatively Treated Group : Quality life assess 3 week prior palliative therapy 4 week begin palliative therapy . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 220 patient ( 110 per group ) accrue study within 2 year .
